title: Tomato Chipotle Chicken Tacos
directions: Add the chicken to the crockpot and season with salt and pepper.
Stir together the remaining ingredients and add to the slow cooker.
Cook for 4 hours until chicken is tender and can be easily shredded or chopped. My slow cooker takes 4 hours on the low setting.
ingredients: 2.5 lb1.13 kg boneless skinless chicken breast
20 oz566.98 ml fire roasted crushed tomatoes
3 tbsp.21.38 ml chipotle peppers in adobo sauce (or to taste)
